title: BREAKING! NASA Awards Axiom Space New Contract For Next-Gen ISS Spacesuits
summary: Axiom Space has been awarded a contract by NASA to modify its next-generation Artemis III lunar spacesuit design to enhance NASA's spacewalking capabilities on the ISS.

title: NASA Expands Options for Spacewalking, Moonwalking Suits, Services
summary: NASA has awarded Axiom Space and Collins Aerospace task orders under existing contracts to advance spacewalking capabilities in low Earth orbit, as well as moonwalking services for Artemis missions.

title: Benchmark raises $33 million in Series B round
summary: With the money raised, Benchmark plans to shift its focus from propulsion system research and development to manufacturing and testing.

title: AI, quantum and nuclear technologies are key to Lockheed Martin’s vision for Space 2050
summary: Through a project called Destination: Space 2050, Lockheed Martin executives are exploring, for example, how AI could assist scientific exploration of locations where communications with remote sensors would be disrupted by high latency.

title: Astronomers solve mystery of how a mirror-like planet formed so close to its star
summary: The atmosphere is super-saturated with silicate and metal vapors.
